B

BLACK_CHECKER - Static variable in class com.dca.checkers.model.Board
The ID of a white checker in the checker board.
BLACK_KING - Static variable in class com.dca.checkers.model.Board
The ID of a black checker that is also a king.
Board - Class in com.dca.checkers.model
The Board class represents a game state for checkers.
Board() - Constructor for class com.dca.checkers.model.Board
Constructs a new checker game board, pre-filled with a new game state.
btnPause - Variable in class com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
The button that when clicked, pauses the game.
btnRedo - Variable in class com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
The button that when clicked, redo the last move.
btnRest - Variable in class com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
The button that when clicked, reset the game.
btnResume - Variable in class com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
The button that when clicked, restarts the game if it was previously paused.
btnStart - Variable in class com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
The button that when clicked, starts the game.
btnUndo - Variable in class com.dca.checkers.ui.OptionPanel
The button that when clicked, undo the last move.
